Title: Chak De! India
Writer: Jaideep Sahni (dialogue), Jaideep Sahni (screenplay), Jaideep Sahni (story)
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Vidya Malvade, Sagarika Ghatge, Shilpa Shukla
Plot: Kabir Khan is the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team and his dream is to make his all girls team emerge victorious against all odds.
